channel.title: Karil The Tainted problems
channel.description:
Well, I finally got into private servers. I was playing around, making new commands and stuff. I made a command that gives you full karil with an xbow, but there was a glitch.
It worked fine, but both the coif and the leathertop went into the place of the weapon ( in this case xbow), so you couldn't wield a, lets say whip and a leathrop top at the same time. Here are the id's im using, all taken from items.xml, and all are 100%.
[code] }else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows karil")){ addItem(4940, 1); //top addItem(4946, 1); //skirrt addItem(4928, 1); // coif addItem(4934, 1); // xbow addItem(2414, 1); //cape addItem(4131, 1); //boot addItem(2491, 1); //gloves addItem(1712, 1); //ammy addItem(2572, 1); //ring addItem(4740, 5000); //bolt racks sendMessage("You are now karil, the tainted!"); }[/code]
My question is, where is the location of every single item, and it's properties? This is so I could edit the leathertop and skirt so it would take up their normal spaces.
All help is appreciated, 1337h4x. BTW: this is all done in MoparScape 3.0.

item.title: Karil The Tainted problems
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

Yep you can place all of those item ids into the item.java in there corrrect array, that will place them in the propper slot when you wear the item

Read full topic

item.title: Karil The Tainted problems
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

oh lol[br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 10:02:25 PM[/size][hr]btw 13etal look at my mega fart emote in tut section XD

item.title: Karil The Tainted problems
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

[quote=“Drunk On Java, post:2, topic:5340”]just do:
{
npcID = karilsnpc#;
isNPC = true;
}[/quote]

Wdf lmao? Hes not asking to be a pink ghost hes asking how to add items in the right spot… its in item.java lol

Read full topic

item.title: Karil The Tainted problems
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

just do:
{
npcID = karilsnpc#;
isNPC = true;
}

Read full topic

@1337h4x wrote:

Well, I finally got into private servers. I was playing around, making new commands and stuff. I made a command that gives you full karil with an xbow, but there was a glitch.

It worked fine, but both the coif and the leathertop went into the place of the weapon ( in this case xbow), so you couldn’t wield a, lets say whip and a leathrop top at the same time. Here are the id’s im using, all taken from items.xml, and all are 100%.

}else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows karil")){ addItem(4940, 1); //top addItem(4946, 1); //skirrt addItem(4928, 1); // coif addItem(4934, 1); // xbow addItem(2414, 1); //cape addItem(4131, 1); //boot addItem(2491, 1); //gloves addItem(1712, 1); //ammy addItem(2572, 1); //ring addItem(4740, 5000); //bolt racks sendMessage("You are now karil, the tainted!"); }

My question is, where is the location of every single item, and it’s properties?
This is so I could edit the leathertop and skirt so it would take up their normal spaces.

BTW: this is all done in MoparScape 3.0.
